price: 32 Fuyez le péché de la chair, acte infâme et pratique des plus odieuses !
arabic: وَلَا تَقۡرَبُواْ ٱلزِّنَىٰٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَٰحِشَةٗ وَسَآءَ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walā taqrabū al-zinā innahu kāna fāḥishatan wasāa sabīlan
